customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
1. Login as a test user
2. Set the reminder setting to false
3. In the KV store set reminder_ for your target user to 0 (manipulate the KV store data to indicate the user is over due for receiving the reminder)
4. As the logged in user, refresh the page andd click anywhere
5. Set thye setting for reminder to True
4. As the logged in user, refresh the page andd click anywhere
6. 4. As the logged in user, refresh the page andd click anywhere
inline.expectedResult:
On 4. No reminder DM is received
On 6. Reminder DM is received
